datasets.name: IPFLOW
datasets.purpose: IP Flow records are one way records of network sessions as seen from a device such as a router, switch, firewall, and servers

fields.name: peer_ip_src
fields.purpose: The device which sent this record

fields.name: iface_in
fields.purpose: The interface on which the source device received this flow

fields.name: iface_out
fields.purpose: The interface on which the source device sent this flow

fields.name: as_src
fields.purpose: Source ASN - The autonomous system number where the flow started

fields.name: as_dst
fields.purpose: Destination ASN - The autonomous system number where the flow terminated

fields.name: ip_src
fields.purpose: The source IP Address of the flow - IP address are just 32bit or 128bit numbers in Big Endian format

fields.name: ip_dst
fields.purpose: The destination IP Address of the flow - IP address are just 32bit or 128bit numbers in Big Endian format

fields.name: ip_proto
fields.purpose: The IP Protocol used in the flow per https://www.iana.org/assignments/protocol-numbers/protocol-numbers.xhtml

fields.name: tos
fields.purpose: Type of service the flow is marked with

fields.name: packets
fields.purpose: The number of packets in the flow

fields.name: bytes
fields.purpose: The total bytes of this flow

fields.name: timestamp
fields.purpose: The time when the flow was received
